Man this bar gets packed!  And rightfully so.  The food here is awesome!  And, it probably helps that Pinotxo is exposed to pretty heavy foot traffic right near the entrance as people flow into La Boqueria. It's not hard to get discouraged by the hordes of hovering people, but with determination and patience, you just may snatch a spot at the bar or one of the few nearby tables.  After finally grabbing a seat at the bar, my hubby and I ordered a plate of venison and chicken.  We pretty much ordered by eyeing what was currently being prepared and what others were eating.  The chicken was not just your ordinary chicken.  I'm not sure exactly how it was cooked, but it was super juicy, tender, and flavorful.  The venison was also seasoned nicely and cooked to perfection.   It was served on a skewer with a small side salad.  Not exactly cheap, but definitely worth the quality.  Highly recommended for a quick bite when you're visiting La Boqueria.
